page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The Hospital provides both full and part time employment in such jobs as nursing, nursing assisstants, ancillary and clerical work. There are 2 haulage companies. There are 2 firms manufacturing portable buildings. There are several gravel companies. There is a marine engineering company as well as a boat builder who makes and repairs glass-fibre boats. There are 3 builders who employ several men as well as 2 joiners and a firm of plumbers and electricians. Agriculture is still a major source of employment. There is a general store which provides full and part time emploment. There is an abattoir employing several men.
